tuv.seg: The law on fireworks
An dlí maidir le tinte ealaíne
Up to 2006 the law on fireworks in Ireland was unclear
Go dtí 2006 bhí an dlí maidir le tinte ealaíne in Éireann míshoiléir
While serious accidents have resulted from using fireworks, the law only covered the importation of fireworks into Ireland without a licence
Cé gur tharla timpistí tromchúiseacha de bharr tinte ealaíne a úsáid, níor chlúdaigh an dlí ach allmhairiú tinte ealaíne isteach in Éirinn gan cheadúnas
This was more a customs and excise issue rather than a criminal issue
Ba cheist don lucht custam agus mál é sin seachas ceist choiriúil
Part 6 of the Criminal Justice Act 2006 amended the Explosives Act 1875 to give the Gardaí the power to make arrests in relation to possession of unlicensed fireworks

Rinne cuid 6 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 2006 leasú ar an Acht um Pléascáin 1875 chun cumhacht a thabhairt do na Gardaí daoine a ghabháil maidir le tinte ealaíne a bheith ina seilbh acu gan cheadúnas
What does firework mean under the law?
Céard a chiallaíonn tine ealaíne de réir an dlí?
The law gives a very technical definition of a firework
Tugann an dlí sainmhíniú an-teicniúil ar thine ealaíne
A firework includes all those devices which burn and explode to give a loud noise and a visual effect – basically a typical, traditional firework
Áirítear mar thine ealíne gach feiste a dhónn agus a phléascann chun fuaim ard agus éifeacht amhairc a thabhairt – tine ealaíne thipiciúil, thraidisiúnta go bunúsach
Bangers are now defined as fireworks
Sainmhínítear tailmeálaithe mar thinte ealaíne
Since 4 April 2010, under European Communities (Placing on the Market of Pyrotechnic Articles) Regulations 2010 (SI 1/2010) low hazard fireworks are included as category 1 fireworks
Ó 4 Aibreán 2010, faoi Rialacháin na gComhphobal Eorpach (Cur ar an Margadh Airteagail Phiriteicniúla) 2010 (IR 1/2010) tinte ealaíne guais íseal san áireamh mar chatagóir 1 tinte ealaíne
These low hazard fireworks are designed for indoor use and include items such as party-poppers, certain sparklers, Christmas crackers and strips of bangers or caps for toy guns

Ní áirítear tinte ealaíne íseal-ghuaise. Tá na tinte ealaíne íseal-ghuaise seo deartha le n-úsáid laistigh agus áirítear iontu míreanna ar nós 'party-poppers', sparklers áirithe, pléascóga Nollag agus stiallacha tailmeálaithe nó caipíní do ghunnaí bréige
While categry 1 fireworks are available for sale to and use by the general public, it is an offence to sell category 1 fireworks to anyone under 16 years of age
Cé go bhfuil categry 1 tinte ealaíne ar fáil le díol agus úsáid ag an bpobal i gcoitinne, is cion é chatagóir a dhíol 1 tinte ealaíne do dhuine ar bith faoi 16 bliana d'aois
What are the offences for having a firework?
Céard iad na cionta as tine ealaíne a bheith i do sheilbh?
Under the amended legislation the following are offences:
Faoin reachtaíocht leasaithe is cionta iad seo a leanas:
• If you ignite a firework or cause it to be ignited in any place, you are guilty of an offence
• Má lasann tú tine ealaíne nó más tusa cúis lena lasadh in áit ar bith, tá tú ciontach i gcion
The offence of igniting a firework can take place anywhere and not just in a public place
Féadann an cion de thine ealaíne a lasadh tarlú in áit ar bith, ní hamháin in áit phoiblí
It can include the garden of a private house
Féadann gairdín tí príobháidigh a bheith san áireamh
• If you throw, direct or propel an ignited firework at or towards someone else or at property, you are guilty of an offence
• Má chaitheann, má threoraíonn nó má ghluaiseann tú tine ealaíne lasta i dtreo dhuine eile nó i dtreo maoine tá tú ciontach i gcion
• If you have a firework with the intention of selling or supplying it to someone else (and you don't hold a licence to import it) you are guilty of an offence
• Má tá tine ealíne agat agus é ar intinn agat í a dhíol nó a thabhairt do dhuine eile (agus nach bhfuil ceadúnas agat chun í a allmhairiú) tá tú ciontach i gcion
If you are found guilty of any of the above offences you are liable:
Má fhaightear ciontach i gceann ar bith de na cionta thuas tú, beidh tú faoi dhliteanas:
• On summary conviction (in the District Court) to a class C fine or to imprisonment for up to 6 months or to both
• Ar chiontú go hachomair (sa Chúirt Dúiche), rang C fíneáil nó phríosúnacht ar feadh suas le 6 mhí, nó an dá ceann
• On conviction on indictment (in the Circuit Court) to a maximum fine of €10,000 or to imprisonment for up to 5 years or to both
• Ar chiontú ar dhíotáil (sa Chúirt Chuarda), fhíneáil de €10,000 ar a mhéid nó phríosúnacht ar feadh suas le 5 bliana, nó an dá ceann
The offences mentioned above are arrestable offences because they carry a possible 5 year jail sentence
Is cionta inghabhála iad na cionta thuasluaite toisc go mbaineann an fhéidearthacht de phianbhreith príosúin 5 bliana leo
Therefore the Gardaí have the power to arrest you without warrant if they reasonably suspect you of having committed such an offence
Mar sin tá an chumhacht ag na Gardaí tú a ghabháil gan bharántas má cheapann siad go réasúnta go ndearna tú cion dá leithéid
They can also detain you in a Garda station for questioning for up to 12 hours before you are charged with the offence or released
Is féidir leo tú a choinneáil i stáisiún na nGardaí le haghaidh ceistiúcháin chomh maith ar feadh suas le 12 uair a chloig sula gcúiseofar tú i gcion nó sula scaoilfear tú
What can the Gardaí do when investigating these offences?
Céard is féidir leis na Gardaí a dhéanamh agus na cionta seo á n-imscrúdú acu?
The Gardaí have been given wide powers in relation to the investigation of these offences
Tugadh cumhachtaí leathana do na Gardaí maidir leis na cionta seo a imscrúdú
If the Gardaí reasonably suspect you of possessing fireworks for sale or supply without a licence they may:
Tá cheapann na Gardaí go réasúnta go bhfuil tinte ealaíne i do sheilbh agat le díol nó le soláthar gan cheadúnas is féidir leo:
• Request your name and address
• D'ainm agus do sheoladh a iarraidh
• Request you to go to the Garda station for the purpose of verifying your name and address (if they are not satisfied your details are correct)
• Iarraidh ort dul chuig stáisiún na nGardaí chun d'ainm agus do sheoladh a fhíorú (mura bhfuil siad sásta go bhfuil na sonraí cearta tugtha agat)
• Search you without a warrant and detain you for such time as is necessary for the search
• Tú a chuardach gan bharántas agus tú a choinneáil ar feadh an tréimhse a theastaíonn chun an cuardach a dhéanamh
• Enter and search any vehicle, vessel or aircraft without a warrant, if they suspect that a firework may be found there
• Dul isteach i bhfeithicil, árthach nó aerárthach ar bith agus é a chuardach gan bharántas, má cheapann siad go bhfaighidís tine ealaíne ann
• Seize and detain anything found in the course of the search, which is connected with fireworks
• Aon tine ealaíne a fhaigheann siad agus iad i mbun cuardaigh, a bhaineann le tinte ealaíne, a urghabháil agus a choimeád
If the Gardaí suspect that an offence of sale or supply of fireworks without a licence has been committed by you, they may arrest you without a warrant
Má cheapann na Gardaí go bhfuil tú ciontach i dtinte ealaíne a dhíol nó a sholáthar gan cheadúnas, is féidir leo tú a ghabháil gan bharántas

The Gardaí have also been given the power to apply to the District Court for a search warrant which allows them to search a premises at any time (or times) within one week from the date of issue of the warrant

Tugadh an chumhacht do na Gardaí chomh maith iarratas a chur chuig an gCúirt Dúiche chun barántas cuardaigh a fháil a thugann cead dóibh áitreabh a chuardach ag am (nó amanna) ar bith laistigh de sheachtain amháin ón dáta ar a eisítear an barántas
The warrant allows the Gardaí to enter a premises, by force if necessary, and it also allows them to seize anything found in the search
Tugann an barántas cead do na Gardaí dul isteach in áitreabh, le fórsa más gá, agus ligeann sé dóibh aon rud a fhaightear sa chuardach a úrghabháil
The Gardaí are allowed to demand the name and address of anyone who is present at the premises when they are searching it
Tá cead ag na Gardaí ainm agus seoladh aon duine atá i láthair ag an áitreabh agus iad á chuardach a éileamh
Anybody who obstructs the Gardaí during the search under the warrant may be arrested
Féadfar aon duine a bhacann na Gardaí le linn an chuardaigh faoin mbarántas a ghabháil
If found guilty in court, you may be liable on summary conviction to a class C fine or to imprisonment for up to 6 months, or to both
Má fhaightear ciontach tú sa chúirt, d'fhéadfá a bheith faoi dhliteanas rang C fíneáil nó phríosúnacht ar feadh suas le 6 mhí, nó an dá ceann
Can I organise a fireworks display at a special event such as a party?
An féidir liom tinte ealaíne a úsáid ag ócáid speisialta mar chóisir?
Yes, but the fireworks must be licensed for import and only if a professional fireworks operator is used
Is féidir, ach ar dtús, caithfear ceadúnas a fháil chun na tinte ealaíne a allmhairiú
If you want to import fireworks into Ireland you must apply for a licence or get a professional fireworks operator to apply, on your behalf, to the Department of Justice and Equality
Má theastaíonn uait tinte ealaíne a allmhairiú isteach in Éirinn caithfidh tú iarratas a chur isteach ar cheadúnas chuig an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais
Application forms are available (Word) from the Department and can be downloaded from the Department's website
Tá foirmeacha iarratais ar fáil (Word) ón Roinn agus is féidir iad a íoslódáil ó láithreán gréasáin na Roinne
The application must be made at least one month before the proposed event
Caithfear an t-iarratas a chur isteach mí amháin ar a laghad roimh an ócáid molta
The licence is free
Tá an ceadúnas saor in aisce
Details which you must provide when applying include the following:
Áirítear ar na sonraí a bhfuil ort a sholáthar agus an t-iarratas á chur isteach agat:
• Your name and address as the applicant
• D'ainm agus do sheoladh mar an iarrthóir
• The name and address of the organiser of the fireworks display
• Ainm agus seoladh eagraí an taispeántais tinte ealaíne
• The name and address of the operator of the display
• Ainm agus seoladh oibreoir an taispeántais
• The name and address of the safety officer for the display
• Ainm agus seoladh an oifigigh shábháilteachta don taispeántas
• The date, location and reason for the display
• Dáta, suíomh agus cúis an taispeántais
Furthermore you must confirm to the Department:
Sa bhreis ar sin, caithfidh tú a dheimhniú don Roinn:
• That you have read and are aware of the contents of the Guidance Document on Organised Pyrotechnic Displays (pdf)
• Gur léigh tú an Cháipéis Threorach ar Thaispeántais Phiriteicniúla Eagraithe (pdf) agus go bhfuil ábhair na cáipéise sin ar eolas agat
This document is available fromthe Department
Tá an cháipéis seo le fáil ón Roinn
• That all operators used in the display are competent, in accordance with the guidance document
• Go bhfuil na hoibreoirí go léir a úsáidtear sa taispeántas inniúil, de réir na cáipéise treoraí
• That adequate public liability insurance is in place
• Go bhfuil árachas dliteanais phoiblí fónta acu
• That you have consulted the local authority Fire Officer
• Gur chuaigh tú i gcomhairle le hOifigeach Dóiteáin an údaráis áitiúil
• That you have consulted the local Gardaí
• Gur chuaigh tú i gcomhairle leis na Gardaí áitiúla
• That you have consulted with all other relevant interested parties, for example, your neighbours
• Gur chuaigh tú i gcomhairle leis na páirtithe leasmhara ábhartha eile go léir, mar shampla, do chomharsana
If granted, the licence allows you to import the fireworks and operate and display them in accordance with the terms set out in the licence
Mura bhfuil aon agóid ag na Gardaí cuireann siad é sin in iúl don Roinn agus ceadófar do cheadúnas

It is important to note that anyone who operates a fireworks display (even a small one in your own garden), without the appropriate licence is committing an offence which carries a maximum penalty of 5 years imprisonment

Tá sé tábhachtach a thabhairt faoi deara go bhfuil aon duine a chuireann taispeántas tinte ealaíne ar siúl (fiú amháin ceann beag i do ghairdín féin), gan cheadúnas cuí ciontach i gcion ar a bhfuil uasphíonós de 5 bliana i bpríosún

In order to apply for a licence to import fireworks, you must complete an application form, or get a professional fireworks operators to complete one on your behalf, and forward this form directly to Department of Justice and Equality
D'fhonn iarratas a chur isteach ar cheadúnas chun tinte ealaíne a allmhairiú, caithfidh tú foirm iarratais a chomhlánú agus a chur ar aghaidh díreach chuig an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionannais
Queries in connection with fireworks should be addressed to your local Garda station or to the Department. Where to apply
Ba chóir ceisteanna maidir le tinte ealaíne a chur chuig do stáisiún Gardaí áitiúil nó chuig an Roinn
